text:
I have a web application. When I do a repeated deploy/undeploy its giving me 
OutOfMemory error on tomcat 5.5.20. What could be the issue and what is the 
solution?
creator: sandeep.hublikar@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
There have been a couple of fixes in this area since 5.5.20 but the usual cause
is a programming error.

There isn't any information in this report that suggests it is a Tomcat issue so
please upgrade to the latest 5.5.x and use the users list for more help.
